Sprites.AllowValues: default, Default - Neon ~ Pearl Prismatic (made by Airyn), Default - Desaturated (made by Airyn), Default - Desaturated ~ Pearl Prismatic (made by Airyn), Gwen's Medieval Craftables with vines (made by plaidbees), Gwen's Medieval Craftables with no vines (made by plaidbees), Nano's Craftables (made by wildflour), Legacy - Neon, Legacy - Desaturated
Sprites.Description: Choose between 4 sets of sprites with different variations: default (made by Airyn), Gwen's Craftables (made by plaidbees), Nano's Craftables (made by wildflour) and Legacy (the MPS 1.0 sprites).

Enable Black Garlic Cheese.Description: Check the box to enable Black Garlic Cheese in your game (it requires 'Enable Black Garlic' to be checked). To make Black Garlic Cheese, place a piece of Black Garlic and Milk in the Cheese Press. If 'Enable Aged Milks' is true, Aged Black Garlic Cheese will be available as well. Default checked.

Black Garlic Cheese Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 825.

Black Garlic Cheese Exclude Shipping.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.

Aged Black Garlic Cheese Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 1170.

Aged Black Garlic Cheese Exclude Shippin.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.

Enable Aged Coffee.Description: Check the box to enable Aged Coffee and Aged Triple Shot Espresso in your game (it requires 'Enable Aged Coffee Bean' to be checked). To make Aged Coffee, place Aged Coffee Beans in the Keg. Triple Shot Espresso may be obtained as a byproduct. Default checked.

Aged Coffee Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 300.

Aged Coffee Exclude Shipping.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.

Aged Triple Shot Espresso Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 900.

Aged Triple Shot Espresso Exclude Shippi.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.

Enable Berry Liqueur.Description: Check the box to enable Berry Liqueur in your game. To make Berry Liqueur, place a berry in the Keg. Default checked.

Berry Liqueur Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 100.

Berry Liqueur Value Multiplier.Description: Adjust the multiplier applied to the item when obtained through the machine. Default 3 (triple).

Berry Liqueur Bear's Knowledge.Description: Adjust the additional multiplier applied to the item when obtained through the machine after having the Bear's Knowledge. Default 3 (triple).

Berry Liqueur Exclude Shipping.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.

Enable Mineral Water.Description: Check the box to enable Mineral Water in your game. To make Mineral Water, place a gem or mineral in the Keg. Default checked.

Mineral Water Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 100.

Mineral Water Value Multiplier.Description: Adjust the multiplier applied to the item when obtained through the machine. Default 3 (triple).

Mineral Water Exclude Shipping.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.

Enable Pu-erh Tea.Description: Check the box to enable Pu-erh Tea in your game (it requires 'Enable Pu-erh Tea Leaves' to be checked). To make Pu-erh Tea, place Pu-erh Tea Leaves in the Keg. Default checked.

Pu-erh Tea Base Price.Description: Adjust the base price of the item. Default 300.

Pu-erh Tea Exclude Shipping.Description: Check the box to exclude the item from the shipping collection. Default unchecked.
